We need to talk."/pause 700/speak Charlie "Ok, just let me finish this..."/pause 1500/emote Charlie 40/speak Charlie "Ok, I'm coming!"/pause 1000/move Charlie -5 0 0/move Charlie 0 -2 1/faceDirection GuntherWoods 3/speak GuntherWoods "So... #$b# About your payment, the Ferngill Government is trying to reduce costs. So this month, I'm sorry to say, but I can't pay you my nephew...$s"/pause 1000/shake Charlie 10/emote Charlie 12/speak Charlie "*mumbles* Almost every single month...$2"/speak GuntherWoods "Excuse me, Charlie? AND NOW THIS!$5"/emote GuntherWoods 16 true/emote farmer 16/speed farmer 3/jump farmer 8 true/move farmer 0 5 3/move farmer -4 0 0/move farmer 0 -3 3 true/pause 700/speak GuntherWoods "Charlie, this isn't at my control now. We know that we have some problems with money, but you don't have to act like a kid.$a"/pause 700/question fork0 "What you should do?#Offer your money (-2000)#Pretend that you seemed nothing#"/fork Offermoney/playMusic none/pause 1000/move farmer 1 0 1 true/speak Charlie "Humph...$5#$b# I'll see what I can do for this month...$2"/move Charlie 0 5 0/warp Charlie -1000 -1000/playSound doorClose/end dialogue GuntherWoods "I hope we get better soon...$s#$b# I hate this situation, we always have money trouble...$s"
Entries.Offermoney: pause 1000/emote Charlie 16 true/emote GuntherWoods 16/faceDirection Charlie 1 true/move GuntherWoods 0 1 1/speak Charlie "W-what...?$3"/pause 700/speak GuntherWoods "Are you sure @? We really could use some donations here.$h"/money -2000/pause 1000/emote Charlie 20/speak Charlie "Thank you @...$4#$b# And Gunther, with this money, we can finally take that project out of the paper!$h"/pause 500/emote GuntherWoods 16/pause 200/speak GuntherWoods "Probably, but I don't think that we can do this alone."/pause 500/faceDirection Charlie 0/speak Charlie "Oh right...#$b# But I will see what I can do..."/friendship Charlie 100/end
Entries.47360010/f Randy 500/t 1200 1800/d Tue W: jaunty/16 12/farmer 7 14 1 Wizard -100 -100 2 Jas 17 12 0 Vincent 18 12 0 Penny 18 9 2 Randy 10 12 3 Elliott 12 9 2 Charlie 8 11 1/skippable/animate Elliott false true 1820 32 33/animate Penny false true 1752 18 19/move farmer 3 0 1/emote farmer 16/pause 400/faceDirection farmer 0/pause 100/emote farmer 32/pause 100/emote Randy 16/pause 300/move farmer 0 -1 0 true/speak Randy "Hi @!$h#$b#Come just for letting an artifact to Gunther?"/message "You nod your head to say yes"/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 3/faceDirection Randy 3/pause 400/speak Randy "I love books, they help me to speak better...#$b# Elliott is a great writer, but I think that he is afraid of me...$s#$b# I would love to write a book too!$l#$b# But I can't talk to people, they are always afraid of me, only Jas and Vincent are the ones that talk to me as I were a normal person...$s"/pause 500/emote farmer 28/pause 400/question fork0 "Will you help him?#Yes, I will#It isn't my problem#"/fork Helprandy/pause 500/speak Randy "Well, it doesn't matter much...$s#$b# People will always have fear on me, no matter what...$s"/pause 500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 500/message "You fell his problems crawling in your back"/pause 500/message "Looks like you will have a bad time in your dreams..."/pause 100/end

Here!?$8#$b#I want to see him, get me to it!"/pause 500/stopAnimation Elliott 0/move farmer 0 4 2/move Elliott 0 4 2/move farmer -1 0 0/move Elliott -1 0 0/globalFade/viewport -100 -100/pause 1000/speak Wizard "@ started something...#$b#The prophecy was right...#$b#...?!!!$1#$b#@!#$b#What are you doing here?#$b#You're not supposed to be here...
